snippet: President François Hollande promised new efforts to revive the economy, including tax cuts, after his party sustained broad losses on Sunday.
abstract: French Pres Francois Hollande announces the formation of a new government after broad losses by his Socialist party in nationwide city elections; elections are widely seen as a rebuke of Hollande, who is deeply unpopular.

byline.original: By SCOTT SAYARE and MAÏA de la BAUME

lead_paragraph: President François Hollande promised new efforts to revive the economy, including tax cuts, after his party sustained broad losses on Sunday.

headline.main: France Overhauls Its Government After Voters Rebuke Socialists
